review: The app needs further development as it doesn't work properly with the YouTube. But overall it is a very good device with an excellent price
author: Sam

review: My wife and I love the Fire TV stick. Perfect for Netflix and HBO Go. Love it!
author: S. Cusumano

review: Revolutionary, I've been missing out on so much for so long. I now use this so much, I really don't know what I'll be able to do without it.Best part of the Fire Stick is the unlocked rom enabling customizations. Also, having a dual core in such a little package isn't bad either ;-)A must have !!
author: Andrew Prah

review: Very good product, no problem with this item. Thinking of getting another one.
author: PHILIP T LARSON

review: Doesn't work with Plex as advertised.
author: Ralph Williams

review: easy to use and fast setup.
author: Adrian
